name: SPLIT 3310 (Nokia Jam 3)
description:
Stop the machine at the right moment to create perfect splits!

A perfect split has an equal number of points on both sides of the line. Points on the dividing line are distributed to the side (or sides) that will benefit the player the most. (You can tell if a point is on the line by whether its color is inverted).

Tip: Stopping the divider directly on top of one or more points will make splitting more forgiving, but mistiming it could be deadly!

When a bad split occurs, one life is lost per pair of unbalanced points. When all lives are lost, the game is over. Otherwise, it continues indefinitely. Level 30 is tough to reach.

There will always be an even number of points in a level.

Controls:

  • Enter or Space to SPLIT
  • R to restart

Credits:

Art and programming by Ghast
Sound effects are from the "TRIX SOUND PACK" by Trix

Made between Feb 1 - Feb 7, 2021 for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3. This jam imposes severe resolution, sound, and color restrictions on its entries, requiring all games to be 84x48 and use only two specific colors.

Made with Phaser 3
